contentList.content: You have Disadvantage on attack rolls with a Heavy weapon if it’s a Melee weapon and your Strength score isn’t at least 13 or if it’s a Ranged weapon and your Dexterity score isn’t at least 13.

When attacking with a heavy melee weapon you are <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with and are wielding in both hands, <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.

When you land a Critical Hit or kill a target with a melee weapon attack, you can make another melee weapon attack as a bonus action that turn.

Attacks with heavy melee weapons you are Proficient with, and are wielding in both hands, can deal an additional 10 damage at the cost of a -5 Attack Roll penalty. (You can toggle this on and off.)

Heavy weapons dish out tremendous damage, but only capable warriors can manage their size and bulk effectively.

When weilding a heavy weapon, you have Disadvantage on Attack Rolls with a Melee weapon and your Strength score isn’t at least 13 or if it’s a Ranged weapon and your Dexterity score isn’t at least 13.
